attributes.action: step down. Gordon Brown has done nothing good for the country as PM and needs to hand over to someone that can really do the job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown did nothing but cry to become the PM and now that he is the PM he has done nothing but make our country look silly.
Gordon cant stand up for run the country.

Do the right thing Gordon, Step down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
